alert.note: Alert for Cheatham; Dickson; Houston; Montgomery (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 30 at 7:45PM CDT until March 30 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Dickson County in Middle Tennessee... Montgomery County in Middle Tennessee... Northwestern Cheatham County in Middle Tennessee... Eastern Houston County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 745 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Big Rock to near McEwen, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Clarksville, Vanleer, Slayden, Cheatham Dam, Palmyra, Cunningham and Woodlawn. This includes Interstate 24 between mile markers 1 and 16. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for Middle Tennessee.
